title: Gold 5 Team LF support main
body:
I am looking for a sup main plat level, must be 18+ years of age. We play everyday at 8pm and on weekends 10pm if we have 5. We are all plats with  one diamond. Please have skype and a good attitude! 

Add me skt1 demonslayer

replies.body:
Hi,

Plat 5 Support main here. Can play most nights. My champion pool consists of most supports, have added you in game if you would like to discuss more :)
8pm trials tonight, I have recently had issues with my net so I might be playing tonight however I will most probs be watching =) See you on tonight
15 :( it amazes me how hard it is to get out of bronze 1. if your willing to give me a chance in a norms game, I would appreciate it
